1: <pb/><t>Cächa' ri Ajawaxel:</t> <t>“Aretak chopan we jok'otaj ri'</t> <t>quinban na chi cäq'uextaj</t> <t>ri u taklebem ri Juda</t> <t>xukuje' ri Jerusalen.</t>
2: <t><f>[10]</f>Quebenmulij na</t> <t>conojel tak ri nimak tak tinimit,</t> <t>queben c'am na bic</t> <t>chupam ri beya' re Josapat</t> <t>chila' c'ut quink'at wi na tzij paquiwi'</t> <t>che ri xquiban che ri nu tinimit Israel.</t> <t>Xequijabuj c'u ri aj israelib</t> <t>pa ronojel ri uwächulew,</t> <t>xquijach c'ut ri wulew chquiwäch.</t>
3: <t>Xquijach ri nu tinimit</t> <t>chquij ri quequitaklej,</t> <t>xebequic'ayij ri alaj tak alabom</t> <t>xukuje' ri alaj tak alitomab,</t> <t>xequisacha' c'ut ri puak</t> <t>che u lok'ic u wa'l uva</t> <t>xukuje' che qui tojic</t> <t>tak ixokib quech nim ch'utin.”</t>
4: <pb/>“¿Jas ri qui waj chwe in, Tir, Sidon xukuje' pilistey? ¿La are quiwaj quinya' rajil q'uexelal chiwe? ¿La are quiwaj c'o jas qui tok'ij? ¡Quinyaxtaj c'u na ri takal chiwe!
5: <pb/>Ri ix xiweläk'aj ri nu sak puak xukuje' ri nu k'an puak, xebic'am tak bic ri e nu k'inomal xebiya' chquipam tak ri e cachoch tak ri e i diosib.
6: <pb/>Naj, xebic'am wi bic tak ri winak aj Juda, xukuje' tak ri aj Jerusalen, xebic'ayij c'ut jacha' ta ne lok'om tak pataninelab chque ri aj gresib.
7: <pb/>Are c'u ri in quebenwesaj ulok chupam ri c'olbal jawije' tak ri xebic'ayij wi, quenbana' c'u na' chiwe ix chi quebicoch' na ri junam taklebenic.
8: <pb/>Quebenc'ayij na tak ri e i c'ojol xukuje' tak ri e i mia'l chque tak ri aj judeyib, rech e are' quebec'ayin chque ri uj Sebeyib, winak ri naj e c'o wi tak ri culew. In, ri Ajawaxel, nu yo'm u bixic.”
9: <pb/><t>Chiya' u bixic wa'</t> <t>chque ri nimak tak tinimit;</t> <t>¡Chik'alajisaj ri tastalicalaj ch'o'j!</t> <t>¡Chesiq'uix ri cowilaj tak achijab!</t> <t>¡Chepetok chebequich'äca'</t> <t>ri e banal tak ch'o'j!</t>
10: <t>Chebequibana' ch'ich' re ch'o'j</t> <t>chque tak ri casaron,</t> <t>xukuje' tak tz'imaj ch'ich'</t> <t>chque tak ri qui jos,</t> <t>chubij c'ut ri tukar:</t> <t>“¡In c'o nu chuk'ab!”</t>
11: <t><f>[11]</f>Iwonojel ix,</t> <t>c'ulja nimak tak tinimit,</t> <t>¡Chixpet aninak, chixpet</t> <t>che u mulixic iwib!</t> <t>¡Chi xukuje' ne ri aj jamaril</t> <t>cux banal ch'o'j!</t>
12: <t>Chiquicolomaj tak quib</t> <t>ri nimak tak tinimit chebopan c'ut</t> <t>chupam ri beya' re Josapat,</t> <t>chila' c'u cuk'at wi na</t> <t>tzij ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>paquiwi' ri c'ulja ri nimak tak tinimit.</t>
13: <t>Rumal c'u rech</t> <t>chi sibalaj e itzel tak winak,</t> <t>chek'atok jacha' ri caban</t> <t>che ri trico aretak chaki'j chic,</t> <t>u k'ijol chi c'ut ri k'atoj;</t> <t>chebixak'alela' jacha' cäban</t> <t>chque tak ri uva,</t> <t>ronojel c'ut suc'umatal chic</t> <t>che resaxic u wa'l uva.</t>
14: <t>E c'o e q'uia winak</t> <t>chupam ri beya' re ri k'atan tzij,</t> <t>rumal rech chi nakaj chic c'o wi</t> <t>ri u k'ij ri Ajawaxel.</t>
15: <t>Ri k'ij xukuje' ri ic'</t> <t>quek'ekumaric</t> <t>xukuje' tak ri ch'imil</t> <t>man quequiya' ta chic ri qui jolk'inic.</t>
16: <t>Ri Ajawaxel aretak chubano</t> <t>chi chatataj ri u ch'abal</t> <t>re cakulja c'ä pa ri juyub Sion,</t> <t>pa Jerusalen,</t> <t>ri caj xukuje' ri ulew</t> <t>caquichaplej birbitem.</t> <t>Are c'u ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>are jun panibal to'balib</t> <t>chque ri aj israelib, ri e u tinimit.</t>
17: <t>“Ri ix quitzelej chi na iwib</t> <t>che retamaxic chi in ri' ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>ri i Dios,</t> <t>in jekel pa Sion,</t> <t>ri nu juyub ri tastalic.</t> <t>Ri Jerusalen cux na</t> <t>jun tinimit ri tastalic:</t> <t>mawi jumul cach'äc ta chi na</t> <t>cumal tak winak ri naj quepe wi.</t>
18: <t>Pa ri k'ijol ri',</t> <t>ri u wa'l uva</t> <t>xukuje' ri leche quebelel na</t> <t>jacha' ta ne ja' pa tak ri juyub</t> <t>xukuje' paquiwi' tak ri juyub,</t> <t>are c'u ri alaj tak nima' re Juda</t> <t>telechi'm ri ja' caquic'am ulok.</t> <t>Chupam ri wachoch cäq'uiy wi na</t> <t>u bic jun bulbux ja'</t> <t>ri cäjan ri beya' re Sitim.</t>
19: <t>Ri Ejipt cäcanaj na pa etzeletajic,</t> <t>are c'u ri Edom caq'uextaj na</t> <t>pa jun chaki'j uwo sak,</t> <t>rumal rech chi xquiban c'ax</t> <t>chque ri winak ri aj Juda</t> <t>xquitix c'ut ri quic'</t> <t>ri man c'o ta u mac pa ri culew.</t>
20: <t>In quintok'ij na ri rajil</t> <t>u quiq'uel ri quic'</t> <t>chque ri man nu tok'im taj.</t> <t>Are c'u ri Juda xukuje' ri Jerusalen</t> <t>amak'el quejujayir na winak chquipam,</t> <t>are c'u ri in quinjujayir na</t> <t>chupam ri juyub aj Sion.”</t>
